thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com | 5 of 806
thread.title: SHARON

author: SHARON
title: SHARON
text: My BROTHER Intellifax 950M PLAIN PAPER FAX MACHINE TAKES A CERTAIN CARTRIDGE WHICH i FOUND ON YOUR WEBSITE.. I WAS THRILLED BECAUSE NO STATIONERY SUPPLY STORES CAN ACCESS THIS PRODUCT REPLACEMENT EXCEPT ON YOUR WEBSITE. WHEN I CALLED INKFARM TO ASK IF THIS PRODUCT WOULD BE COMING FROM THE STATES @ us PRICES, THE OPERATOR ADJUSTED THE PRICE SOME BECAUSE WE PAY VERY HIGH RATES FOR US MONEY. THEN I RECEIVED ANOTHER EMAIL SAYING THAT THE CARTRIDGE COULDN'T BE SUPPLIED. i WAS DISAPPOINTED FOR SURE. EXCEPT FOR THE ABILITY TO FOLLOW THROUGH ON THE ORDER, EVERYTHING WAS FINE.
